lead_paragraph: HAFFNER--Dr. Alden Norman. It is with great sadness that NYU Wagner remembers esteemed alumnus Dr. Alden Norman Haffner. The founding President of the SUNY College of Optometry, Dr. Haffner was a noted scholar and an indomitable advocate for optometry and public health. He will always be remembered for his immense contributions to public service. 1/3
